ChrisTitusApp.ps1: Chris Titus Tech's Windows Utility - Install Programs, Tweaks, Fixes, and Updates. Dev: https://github.com/ChrisTitusTech/winutil
Restart Explorer.ps1: Restarts the Windows Explorer process to refresh the desktop and taskbar.
Create Restore Point.ps1: This script creates a system restore point to save your current system state.
Uninstall OneDrive.ps1: This script completely removes OneDrive from your Windows system.
Resore all built-in apps.ps1: This will restore all preinstalled inbox apps of Microsoft.
Remove default apps.ps1: This script will remove all preinstalled inbox apps using PowerShell.
File Extensions Visibility.json: This plugin shows or hides hidden file extensions in Windows Explorer.
Clear Icon Cache.json: This plugin clears the icon cache in Windows to resolve issues with icons displaying incorrectly.
Windows Rollback Timer.json: This plugin adjusts the time window available to revert to a previous version of Windows after an upgrade.
Windows Old Remover.json: This plugin will remove the ability to roll back a PC to a previous installation of Windows.
